name: Indiana Jones 5 Game
description:
This is 'Indiana Jones 5 Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media. The game's storyline, set in the modern world, follows Indiana Jones as he continues to recover from his injuries and recover from being a hero to the people of Scotland.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iQfEgx6ljWO#t=1m40s http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hqGvTQ6ZhIf#t=2m53s This game is set in a modern, open world. From the look of it, this will be a game for PC players, not consoles because we don't have a great amount of console support for a while. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ksxqkVJE9oI#t=3m49s The game is set to follow in the field of archaeology, where he has to retrieve artifacts from an underground mine. Over the years, the game has been described as a "Classical Open World RPG". It has been out for quite some time, but it's only with this video that we've been able to get our hands on it. A huge thanks goes to Outhouse Media for successively bringing out more and more of their games and offering us a chance to try them out, here's hoping we've found a lot more treasures this time! Who wants to try the game out now
